Uses of Class
ej.microui.io.ComponentView

Packages that use ComponentView
ej.microui.io   
 

Uses of ComponentView in ej.microui.io
 

Subclasses of ComponentView in ej.microui.io
 class CompositeView
          CompositeView is a container class of ComponentViews.
 class View
          View is an abstract class which extends ComponentView.
 

Methods in ej.microui.io that return ComponentView
 ComponentView Viewable.getComponentView()
          Returns the current ComponentView of the viewable.
 ComponentView[] CompositeView.getViews()
          Returns all ComponentView objects contained in this CompositeView.
 

Methods in ej.microui.io with parameters of type ComponentView
 void CompositeView.add(ComponentView view)
          Adds a ComponentView object to this CompositeView object.
 void CompositeView.arrange(ComponentView view, int arrange)
          By default, the ComponentViews are rendered from the first one added to the CompositeView to the last one.
 void CompositeView.remove(ComponentView view)
          Removes a View from this CompositeView.
 void Viewable.setComponentView(ComponentView view)
          Defines the viewable's ComponentView.
